> [5s1c](#comment_1_16rbcatLp1ku5QZJPHqCg71ZNuLTD97DcE): Circumcision with early genital pain contribute to the proper encoding of the brain and sexual self-control.
Sexual mutilation in the childhood alters the brain. YES.
Studies demonstrated that circumcised infants have increased anxiety and pain sensitivity later in life.
Symptoms of post traumatic stress disorder, depression, anger, and intimacy problems were directly associated with feelings about their circumcision. (Boyle, 2002; Goldman, 1999; Hammond, 1999)
Stop circumcision then less extremists we will have later.
